content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, it's great to meet you. What rental price are you offering for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate, so please tell me your offer.

I am looking for the lowest price possible, so please let me know what you are willing to accept.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: My current offer for this apartment is 1500 Euros per month. Is that something you are willing to discuss?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am open to negotiation, so please tell me your offer.

I am looking for the lowest price possible, so please let me know what you are willing to accept.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia
